panels.description: not ideal as some overlap is still there

targets.targetFull: alias(diffSeries(sumSeries(absolute(grep(stats.gauges.$shard.hives.*.resourceEvents.$resource.*.*, '\.spawn\.'))), alias(sumSeries(grep(absolute(grep(stats.gauges.$shard.hives.*.resourceEvents.$resource.*.*, '\.spawn\.')), 'Queen_bee|Carpenter_bee')), 'managers'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Honey_bee')), 'upgrader'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Mason_bee')), 'builder'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Garden_bumblebee|Ground_beetle|Dragonfly')), 'depositmining'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Japanese_beetle')), 'mineralmining'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Scarabaeus_sacer')), 'energymining'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Bumblebee')), 'haulers'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Walking_stick')), 'defense'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Orchid_Mantis|Firefly')), 'annexupkeep'), alias(sumSeries(grep(#C, 'Hercules_beetle|Atlas_moth')), 'powermining'), alias(grep(#C, 'Housefly|Luna_moth|European_hornet|Red_paper_wasp|Assasin_bug|Leaf_insect'), 'attackers')), 'other')
